summary: SummaryErborian's Skin Therapy Eye has all the power of Erborian's Korean skincare in a multi-perfecting eye cream
details: DetailsFeaturesSkin Therapy Eye has all the power of Erborian's Korean skincare in a multi-perfecting eye cream. Its promise: to visibly transform the look of your eye area overnight, so you can wake up feeling confident about your eyes!Skin Therapy Eye also sooths the skin around the eyes thanks to the powerful properties of Centella Asiatica.With Korean Ginseng complex as effective as Retinol**Comparative test 2% Ginseng complex and 1% Retinol (ex vivo test on skin explants after 72 hours).BenefitsPuffiness (1): Thanks to caffeine known for improving the appearance of under-eye bags and dark circlesDark Circles(1) : Thanks a combination of Caffeine, Escin and 5% Niacinamide to target signs of fatigueFine Lines & Wrinkles (3): Thanks to White & Red Ginseng Root Extracts, Wild yam, Kigelia, Giant horsetail & Licorice, known to have a smoothing action*Hydration(4): Thanks to Bamboo and Hyaluronic Acid, which targets skin hydration around the eyesTexture(3): Thanks to Yuzu extract known for antioxidant protection and to help complexion evenness.Radiance(3): Thanks to red pepper, which targets luminosityNourishment(3): Thanks to Shea Butter known for its nourishing propertiesEffectiveness provided by a complex of plant extractsClinical scoring on 22 volunteers after 14 daysClinical scoring on 22 volunteers after 14 daysClinical scoring on 33 volunteers after 14 daysEfficacy Test on 11 volunteers after 2 hoursResearch ResultsResults After 1st Night:100% agree that eye contour is hydrated (1)100% agree that eye contour is visibly smoother (1)After 14 Days:100% agree that eye contour is visibly firmer(1)100% agree that skin texture of eye contour is refined(1)86% agree appearance of under eye bags is visibly diminished(2)After 28 Days:97% agree that the appearance of fine lines are visibly reduced91% agree that the appearance wrinkles are visibly reducedClinically Tested: -36% reduction in appearance of wrinkles(3) -33% reduction in appearance of dark circles color intensity(4)(1) Consumer test on 33 volunteers(2) Consumer test on 22 volunteers after 14 days(3) Clinical scoring on 33 volunteers after 28 days(4) Clinical scoring on 19 volunteers after 28 daysItem 2641793How To UseIn the evening, apply a fine layer to the eye area and massage in.Depending on your skin's needs, you could also apply a thick layer and use it like a mask.IngredientsAqua/Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, 1.2-Hexanediol, Octyldodecanol, Squalane, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Propanediol, Palmitic Acid, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Dioscorea Villosa (Wild Yam) Root Extract, Acmella Oleracea Extract, Phyllostachys Bambusoides Extract, Citrus Junos Fruit Extract, Capsicum Annuum Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Leaf Extract, Equisetum Giganteum Extract, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Kigelia Africana Fruit Extract, Oryza Sativa Bran Wax / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Phyllostachys Bambusoides Juice, Lactobacillus Ferment, Lactobacillus/Panax Ginseng Root Ferment Filtrate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Stearic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Lactic Acid, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Silica, Caffeine, Arginine, Cellulose, Mica, Isoniacinamide, Sodium Hyaluronate, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Escin, Panthenol, Tocopherol, Cyclodextrin, Hydroxypropyl Cyclodextrin, Pentylene Glycol, Adenosine, Caprylyl Glycol, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Chrysin, CI 77891/Titanium Dioxide.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: In the evening, apply a fine layer to the eye area and massage in.Depending on your skin's needs, you could also apply a thick layer and use it like a mask.
ingredients: Oryza Sativa Bran Wax / Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Wax

reviews.headline: Instant results
reviews.comments: From the first use, i saw an immediate response . Delicate eye area was uplifted, under eye discoration and bags dissapeared . My 60 year old eyes look tighter , and more youthful. Worth every penny . Works better then any prestige brand,  that I have paid more then double for in the past.

faceoff_positive.comments: The skin around my eyes is particularly delicate, and I've noticed that with prolonged use, my under-eye area feels significantly more resilient by morning.   The Skin Therapy Eye Cream has a wonderfully whipped texture, and you only need a small amount, about the size of a grain of rice. Its excellent spreadability ensures that it smooths and deeply hydrates the eye area without feeling greasy. Despite how nourishing it is, the cream surprisingly feels lightweight.  Like other Erborian products, something magical happens when this cream comes into contact with the skinâ€”it becomes richer and absorbs beautifully. I love waking up to brighter, smoother, and more hydrated eyes, with noticeably reduced dark circles.
faceoff_positive.headline: Visible improvement

faceoff_negative.comments: I used this one time, and my skin was very raw and chapped the next day. Felt burnt. This eye cream was the only change in my face routine. Sad to say I was hoping this would be my new eye cream. Hope it works for others!
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for me
